ygData.subject: Re: Song 43
ygData.msgSnippet: Forget any, we should get med hands down....If any, let alone one song uses mana, and alot if not all of it at that, we should be able to med. ... From: dennis
ygData.messageBody:
Forget any, we should get med hands down....If any, let alone one song uses
mana, and alot if not all of it at that, we should be able to med.
-----Original Message-----
From: dennis wojdyla <dwojdyla@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, June 11, 1999 12:39 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Song 43


>From: dennis wojdyla <dwojdyla@...>
>
>Well, if we get anymore songs that require mana i'am thinking Meditation
>will be needed (like all other hybrids)
>
>Rinwin
>
>

>>
>>Shada Silverleaf, Level 43 Bard (and anxious to try the song!), Mithaniel
